skills.title: Front-End Expertise
skills.description: I excel in creating visually appealing and highly interactive user interfaces using Angular, React.js, and HTML, ensuring seamless and responsive designs.

skills.title: Back-End Expertise
skills.description: I develop robust and scalable back-end solutions using C# and .NET Core, integrating seamlessly with front-end components for a smooth user experience.

skills.title: Machine Learning Expertise
skills.description: I specialize in Large Language Models (LLM), Reinforcement Learning (RL), and Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), developing advanced models for intelligent decision-making.

skills.title: Cloud-Based Development
skills.description: I design, deploy, and manage scalable applications on AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud, leveraging cloud services to optimize performance and enhance security.
